text: Mouriri is a genus of plants in the family Melastomataceae. Species include: * Mouriri completens, (Pitt.) Burret * Mouriri gleasoniana, Standl. * Mouriri laxiflora, Morley * Mouriri panamensis, Morley * Mouriri guianensis, Aublet Category:Melastomataceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mouriri
